p.d: Invited by the King and Queen of Belgium, the Bel Ayre ensemble presents "A Canzone 'e Partenope", a concert of popular Neapolitan songs drawn from a repertory stretching from the 12th century to the current day. Instrumental music, composed by Peter Verhelst, adds variety between the songs. With Lieselot De Wilde, soprano vocals; Peter Verhelst, guitar; Jean-Philippe Poncin, clarinet; Lode Vercampt, cello; Dick van der Harst, bandoneon; Yves Peeters, percussion. Directed by: Johan Cloetens (Belgium, 2019)
